channel.title: Posts on Open Network Infrastructure Association
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Open Network Infrastructure Association

item.title: To the infinite and beyond
item.description: We recently achieved an incredible milestone in the Zürich community of The Things Network : we crossed the 100 gateway mark!

item.title: Open Internet Award
item.description: We are very, very happy to announce that today our Open Network Infrastructure Association has been awarded in the category Open Internet at the very first edition of DINAcon , the conference for digital sustainability.

item.title: Tamedia joins the Zürich community
item.description:
We are extremely excited to announce that Tamedia is joining the Zurich community of The Things Network and has just deployed a new outdoors gateway in the heart of the city!

Thank you very much to Fabian Mettler , Thomas Gresch , and everyone that made this possible!

Check out the official press release .

item.title: Make Zurich hackathon
item.description: Between January 27th and February 4th, Zürich was the stage of a community-organized hackathon around the topic of civic technologies, and in particular, The Things Network currently operated in the city.

item.title: Founding Day
item.description: Yesterday was an amazing day: after months in the making, we finally sealed the deal and founded a civil association to support and promote swiss TTN communities and -more generally- open network infrastructure projects in the country!
